imdb.title: Mo Dao Zu Shi
imdb.plot: Wei Wu Xian and Lan Wang Ji meet during a magical training and start working together to solve many mysteries.

episodes.title: Collaboration
episodes.plot: Lan Wangji and Wei Wuxian try together to find out about that evil left hand and then they follow the trail that it points out.

episodes.title: Resentment
episodes.plot: Wei Wuxian meets Jin Ling again. Just there, they found a head and Lan Wangji finds out who that is.

episodes.title: Puzzle Net
episodes.plot: Lan Wangji and Wei Wuxian follows up the trail that leads to Qing He. Meanwhile, the evil left hand in Gusu escaped.

episodes.title: Uncle
episodes.plot: Lan Wangji and Wei Wuxian follows up the traces and found a grave. And then they start to investigate it.

episodes.title: Arrogant
episodes.plot: Wei Wuxian was captured by Jiang Cheng. Wei Wuxian must try to escape.

episodes.title: Quarrel
episodes.plot: Wei Wuxian and Wen Ning are syncing what happened all these years.

episodes.title: Heading For Getting Dark
episodes.plot: Wei Wuxian recalled some important facts about what happened to him in No Night City.

episodes.title: The Truth
episodes.plot: Wei Wuxian discovered some truth about what happened to him in No Night City. At the same time, they both knew Qinghe Nie Sect's family secret.

episodes.title: Banishing Evil: Part 1
episodes.plot: When the news of Yilin Grandmaster's death, people are very happy. At that time, who will know one day he could come back? Day by day, month by month, year by year, many years passed peacefully. After 13 years, in the Mo family house, dead corpses are disturbing Mo family members. So, they asked people who could take care of them. Juniors from Lan family came and help them. At the same night, Mo Xuanyu from that Mo family sacrifice himself to bring back the great grandmaster of Demonic Cultivation Wei Wuxian to get revenge for him. When evil left hand appears and ...

episodes.title: Banishing Evil: Part 2
episodes.plot: Continued from previous, juniors from Lan Clan knows they can't hold it, they requested assistance. When someone from Lan Clan came, Wei Wuxian surprised and fleed the scene immediately. Then he meets with someone from Lanling Jin Clan and immediately after that, he meets with a very old friend. Later, Wei Wuxian, juniors from Lan Clan and Jin Clan. In order to control that evil hand, Wei Wuxian had to summon someone from the past. Because of him, some people know his true identity. What would happen to him after his identity is revealed?

episodes.title: Pursuing Studies
episodes.plot: Wei Wuxian and Jiang Cheng went to Gusu Lan Clan to study.

episodes.title: Water Ghouls
episodes.plot: Wei Wuxian and Jiang Cheng went to Caiyi village with people from Gusu Lan Clan to deal with water ghouls. When they arrived there, they realised that the problem is bigger than they thought.

episodes.title: Heretic Path
episodes.plot: Jiang Cheng discovered Wei Wuxian was about to walk on devil way.

episodes.title: Returning Home
episodes.plot: Due to some problems he created in Gusu Lan Clan, Wei Wuxian is being send back to home. Wei Wuxian comes back to Yunmeng Jiang Clan with Jiang Fengmian.

episodes.title: The Champion
episodes.plot: After a year of Wei Wuxian is back home, Qishan Wen Clan does a hundred clans competition. In that competition, archery competition is one of them. Juniors from a hundred clans compete in the competition. Who will get the first four places?

episodes.title: The Indoctrination
episodes.plot: As a result of Archery competition result, Qishan Wen Clan makes an excuse and requests juniors of a hundred clans to come to Qishan Wen Clan to have lessons. During that time, Qishan Wen Clan's second young master Wen Chao takes them to go hunting. What will go wrong during hunting?

episodes.title: Same Boat
episodes.plot: During hunting, thanks to Qishan Wen Clan's people, the other people from other clans were sealed close in Tuluxuanwu cave and tried to find the way out.

episodes.title: Troubles Begin
episodes.plot: Because of what happened in Tuluxuanwu cave, Qishan Wen Clan send someone to Yunmeng Jiang Clan and request to punish Wei Wuxian. During talking, unexpected things happened and all leads to a lot of problems.

episodes.title: Mountain Collapse
episodes.plot: Connected to previous, because of that unexpected thing happened, Qishan Wen Clan destroys Yunmeng Jiang Clan. Will Wei Wuxian and Jiang Cheng escape from that horrible event?

episodes.title: The Core
episodes.plot: During Wei Ying and Jiang Cheng escape from the people from Qishan Wen Clan, Wei Ying discovers Jiang Cheng's been captured by Qishan Wen Clan. So, he rescues him. Unfortunately, they have been found. Luckily, one of the Qishan Wen Clan helped them. But Wei Wuxian learns the worst thing happened to Jiang Cheng. What would it be?

episodes.title: The Land of Death
episodes.plot: In order to fix what happened to Jiang Cheng, Wei Wuxian does something which no one could do. While he's waiting for Jiang Cheng, people from Qishan Wen Clan including Wen Chao found him. To kill Wei Wuxian because of anger, Wen Chao does the worst thing that he ever does to anyone. What did Wen Chao do to Wei Wuxian? And can Wei Wuxian survive it?

episodes.title: Hide From the Sun
episodes.plot: The battle with Qishan Wen Clan begins. What would happen next?

episodes.title: Calmly Ready
episodes.plot: During the battle with Qishan Wen Clan, unexpected thing happened. What would it be?
